      • initializeCA

        public void initializeCA​(CAInfo caInfo)
                  throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                         CADoesntExistsException,
                         CryptoTokenOfflineException,
                         InvalidAlgorithmException
        Initializes a CA. The CA is updated with the values in caInfo, its status is set to active and certificates are generated.
        Parameters:
        caInfo - CAInfo class containing updated information for the CA to initialize
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if user was denied authorization to edit CAs
        CryptoTokenOfflineException - if the keystore defined by the cryptotoken in caInfo has no keys
        CADoesntExistsException - if the CA defined by caInfo doesn't exist.
        InvalidAlgorithmException - Fail
